dataLink.name: Historical greenhouse gas concentrations for climate modelling (CMIP6)

availability.description: Here, we provide consolidated data sets of historical atmospheric (volume) mixing ratios of 43 greenhouse gases specifically for the purpose of climate model runs.
availability.name: Historical greenhouse gas concentrations for climate modelling (CMIP6)

description: Global annual mean 2010 concentrations for non-CO2 long-lived greenhouse-gases, including CH4, N2O, HFCs, PFCs, SF6, several ODS, and NF3 to serve as input for the CMIP6 Historical simulations.
name: 2010 Non-CO2 Well Mixed GHG
